nodes.text: The Mandalorian dungeon ship was a wartime transport used by various Mandalorian organizations.
The Mandalorian dungeon ships were used by the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders during the Mandalorian Wars.
The class was used as a basis for the Lictor-class dungeon ship thousands of years after the conflict ended. The Mandalorian Protectors used these aging vessels during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
